Trade/Device Name(s): OneTouch Verio Blood Glucose Monitoring System
OneTouch Verio Sync Blood Glucose Meter
Submitter Information: LifeScan Europe, a Div. of Cilag GmbH International
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): OneTouch Verio Sync Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for OneTouch Verio Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood from the fingertip
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood drawn from the fingertip by a single patient for self-testing at home to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
